resources.string: Sisεmεti Accessibility Privileges minnu bε baara kε nin baara in na, olu ye :
"- Accessibility Overlay : ka butɔni yebali dɔ bila kamera ɲɛfɛla tigɛyɔrɔ lamini na ani a duguma walasa ka baara kɛ i n’a fɔ sira surun baarakɛla sugandilenw ka baara kama"
Aw bɛ ekran yeelen wuli ka bɔ hakɛ dɔgɔmanw ni hakɛ caman cɛ
Kamera da wulilen! ka mankutu sɔrɔ wa?!
Aw ye kamera dingɛ kɛ jɛɲɔgɔnya ye, k’a sɔrɔ kunnafoniw walima ko kɛlenw tɛ yen minnu bɛna jira, ni aw ye kamera tigɛcogo digi, o bɛna:
I bolo digi kinin fɛ ka taa kinin fɛ
Butɔn min bɛ se ka kɛ, o da wuli
Kɔsa in na porogaramuw menu da wuli
I bolo digi kinin fɛ ka taa kinin fɛ
Toggle ringer mode (mankan/mute). telefɔni dabila nɔgɔya la sani i ka sunɔgɔ ani k’a bila mankan cogo la n’i kununna
Aw ye ekran ja dɔ ta
App mago bɛ i ka yamaruya la
Fɔlɔ ka se ka sɔrɔko baarakɛyɔrɔ ka yamaruya di
Fɔlɔ ka Dynamic Notification daminɛ settings bannen kɔfɛ
Fɔlɔ ka Notification sɔrɔli yamaruya di
Fɔlɔ ka yamaruyaw di aw ma
Kɔrɔbɔli dɔrɔn de kama, a tɛ kɛ kunnafoni yɛrɛyɛrɛ ye.
A to appli ka baara kɛ kɔkan
Aw ye nin siti in lajɛ %1$s ani ka fɛɛrɛw lajɛ ni jaw ye
Yala i dalen b’a la wa
Ladɔnniyali nafama ye min bɛ sɔrɔ tuma caman na i n’a fɔ kunnafoni min bɛ bɔ kɛnɛ kan
A bɛ daminɛ ekran dafalen na ka sɔrɔ ekran bɛ Off
Kamera tigɛcogo kɛ i n’a fɔ warisɛbɛn cogoya
Ladɔnniyali kɔnɔkow bɔgɔbɔgɔ ka sɔrɔ minɛn datugulen don.
Kunnafoni jira kamera dingɛ lamini na walima yɔrɔ caman na ɛkran kan ni bi cogoya caman ye i bɛ se ka minnu sugandi. a fana bɛ se ka sigi i n’a fɔ kunnafoni LED yeelen.
Aw bɛ baara kɛ ni kamera dingɛ ye i n’a fɔ batiri hakɛ jiralan i n’a fɔ layini sɛrɛkili min bɛ kamera dingɛ lamini o fana bɛ chargement ɲɛtaa jira.
Téléchargements ni uploads minnu bɛ baara kɛ sisan, olu jira i n’a fɔ ɲɛtaa sira sɛrɛkili kamera dingɛ lamini na.
Kamera dingɛ tigɛli kɛ ka kɛ sira surun butɔni ye! wale yɛrɛmahɔrɔnyalenw sigi magali kelen-kelen bɛɛ kama, digi siɲɛ fila, digi jan ani ka kamera fan fila bɛɛ sɔgɔ.
A jira ka ɲɛsin chargement ma
Display animation icon bɛ chargement ni batiri hakɛ jira
Ni i ye kunnafoni bonyalen in digi walasa k’a jɛya, o fana bɛna kunnafoni yɛrɛyɛrɛ saniya
Ni i ye Dynamic Notification digi, o bɛna kɛ:
Click bɛna a da wuli ani long click bɛna a bonya
Aw bɛ papier peint kulɛriw kɛ
Kulɛri kɛli appli kelen-kelen bɛɛ la
Aw bɛ taa a fɛ fu
Ni Dynamic Notification bɛ ye, i ka status bar dogo i kɛtɔ k’a datugu ni kulɛri bɛnnen ye ani ni Dynamic Notification event tɛ yen, i ka status bar jira
Ka kɛɲɛ ni i yɛrɛ sago ye

"Sigida sɔrɔli. k’a sɔrɔ i ma i ka kunnafoniw mara walima k’u tila ɲɔgɔn na. baara bɛɛ bɛ kɛ sigida la kodɔn na i ka telefɔni na. - Pake sigilenw bɛɛ ɲininka walasa i ka se ka Dynamic Notification kulɛri kɛ i yɛrɛ ta ye app kelen-kelen bɛɛ la. "
Aw bɛ weleli kɛ k’a ɲɛsin a yɛrɛ ma
Fɔlɔ ka Dynamic Notification (Dynamic Notification) bali o kɔfɛ ka Helper (Dɛmɛbaga) Dabɔ o kɔfɛ ka Dynamic Notification (Dynamic Notification) Dabɔ
Ladɔnniyali sɔrɔlen jirali cogo la min bonyalen don, a bɛ dɔgɔya segin damadɔ kɔfɛ ani a bɛ se ka dɔgɔya, ka da wuli walima ka saniya ni jɛɲɔgɔnya ye n’a ye.
A bɛ daminɛ ni dɔgɔya ye
Ladɔnniyali sɔrɔlenw jira cogo la min ka dɔgɔ, min bɛ se ka bonya, ka da wuli walima ka saniya ni jɛɲɔgɔnya ye n’a ye.
Ladɔnniyali sɔrɔlenw jira cogo la min bonyalen don ni kunnafoni nafama ye, ani cogo la min ka dɔgɔn kunnafoni nɔgɔman kama
Siɲɛ kelen kunnafoni sɔrɔlen kɔfɛ, o kɔ, a jira tuguni o kɔfɛ tuma o tuma ni ekran dabɔra walima ni a datugulen don.
A to nin appli ka baara kɛ waati min na i b’a fɛ.
A to sistɛmu ka nin appli in bali ka baara kɛ tuma dɔw la.
A’ ye nɔw waleya kunnafoni bonyalen kan fana
Fɔlɔ enable Dɛmɛbaga o kɔfɛ nin
A nafa ka bon ka se k’u kɛ cogo la; fɔlɔ ka Dynamic Notification Helper daminɛ o kɔfɛ ka Dynamic Notification daminɛ
Porogaramɛw sugandi minnu bɛ se ka baara kɛ
A rate takes you a seconds kɔrɔ ye ne fɛ fo abada ani ka dusu don ne kɔnɔ ka styles ni features caman dilan
O cogo kelen de bɛ kɛ ni ekran nkɔni ye
Blur screen ni i bolo ye kunnafoni dɔ bonya walasa ka i sinsin kunnafoni bonyalen kan
Dim screen ni i bolo ye kunnafoni dɔ bonya walasa ka i sinsin kunnafoni bonyalen kan
Aw ye tugu Do Not Disturb mode la
Aw ye fɛn caman lajɛ ka tɛmɛ piblisite kan walasa ka maga caman sɔrɔ
MARK I n’a fɔ a YE YE cogo min na

Écran dafalen cogoya, a kalanni ka nɔgɔn ni telefɔni tɛ bolo la, a ka nɔgɔn ka jaabi di ani ka segin ka fɔ kunnafoniw na. bɛ se ka sigi ka kunnafoniw jira k’a sɔrɔ minɛnw ɲɛ bɛ da ani fana ka kunnafoni gun bonya bolo la ka taa ekran dafalen cogo la ni minɛnw ɲɛ bɛ kɛnɛ kan
Ka da a kan a ye jaabiw di kunnafoniw ma k’a sɔrɔ a ma u kɔnɔkow kalan
Preview settings bɛ fɛn caman Changer test Dynamic Notification
Weele cogoya dɔrɔn (weleli/weleli tɛ), k’a sɔrɔ i ma weleli kunnafoni dɔn, walasa ka i yɛrɛ tanga accedintal touches ma ni i bɛ telefɔni weleli la
"-Window State Changed : Kamera dingɛ min bɛ ɲɔgɔn sɔrɔ"

"- Accessibility Overlay : o la n'i ye kunnafoni sɔrɔ, k'a sɔrɔ ekran bɛ kɛnɛ kan, nin baarakɛminɛn in bɛna ɲɛjirali-yɔrɔ fitinin dɔ ja i n'a fɔ ticker kamera tigɛyɔrɔ kɛrɛfɛ, kunnafoni kunnafoni bɛ sɔrɔ a kɔnɔ. "
Ni i taara a fɛ i bɛ sɔn an ka
Aw bɛ (ja dɔrɔn) cogoya kɛ chargement, music ani ringer events kama
Progressive ring b’a jira ko batiri bɛ charge (sara) la
Yeelen jɛman min bɛ yeelen bɔ kamera dingɛ lamini na
Yeelen bilenman bɛ yeelen bɔ kamera dingɛ lamini na
Progressive ring bɛ batiri hakɛ jira sisan
Batiri cogoya jiralan jira onlu ka sɔrɔ a bɛ lanceur écran kan

Aw bɛ a yɛrɛ bonya ni a bɛ jira k’a sɔrɔ ekran bɛ dabila
Ni ɲumanya ye, i ka appli jate
Aw bɛ a ladilan ni bolo ye
A bɛ sara kalo o kalo
Ni kunnafoniw ni/walima ko caman kɛra

Baarakɛla ka kunnafoni si ma lajɛ walima ka tila i n’a fɔ a fɔra cogo min na Google Play magasin kɔnɔ -> nin appli ɲɛ in -> Donanw lakanani.
Aw kana a jira ni ekran bɛ landscape mode la
Aw kana baara kɛ ni ekran bɛ landscape mode la
Application in tɛ ni Ɛntɛrinɛti sɔrɔli yamaruya ye, o la i ka data tɛ taa yɔrɔ si, i bɛ se ka da a la ko nin fɔlen in bɛ bɔ app info -> permissions la, google play kan walima long click app icon kan.
Kamera dingɛ tɛ nin minɛn in kɔnɔ. Nka, hali bi i bɛ se ka baara kɛ ni fɛnw ye minnu bɛ ɲɔgɔn sɔrɔ ni i magara ekran sanfɛla cɛmancɛ la i n’a fɔ kamera dingɛ dɔ bɛ yen
Baara kɛ ni sigida labɛncogo kɔrɔlenw ye
Ni kamera tigɛlen tɛ dingɛ ye
Ni kamera dingɛ dɔnni otomatiki ma ɲɛ i bɛ se k’a ladilan (bonya ni a bilali) yɔrɔ la

Yɔrɔ min bɛ bɔ ekran sanfɛ da la: %1$s

Baara kɛ ni kamera tigɛcogo ye walasa ka kunnafoni sɔrɔlenw lajɛ fɔlɔ cogo la min ɲɔgɔn tɛ ani min bɛ se ka da
Sistɛmu sigicogo -> Sɔrɔcogo -> baarakɛminɛn minnu bɛ se ka baara kɛ/ minnu sigilen don -> Ladɔnniyali fangama

A ni kamera dingɛ bɛ ɲɔgɔn na

Walasa k’aw hakili jigin kunnafoniw na minnu sirilen bɛ sisan, k’a sɔrɔ ekran bɛ On, segin ka gun jira %1$s segin o segin
Aw bɛ sistɛmu kunkolow falen san fɛ

NAFA: ni o ɲɔgɔnna porogaramu wɛrɛ b’i bolo, n’i b’a ɲini ka kunnafoniw pop-up bali ka sɔrɔ ka dɛsɛ... o bɛna nɔ bila nin porogaramu in na ani k’a kɛ dɛsɛ ye fana, o la, i k’a ɲini sani i k’a kɔrɔbɔ, i ka o baara sugu bali porogaramu wɛrɛw kɔnɔ, n’a bɛ yen. walima ka thier Notification Listener bali
Kɔlɔsili: samsung kan app bɛ se ka kunnafoni pop-up dogo nka a tɛ se ka samsung brief bar dogo o la aw ka kunnafoniw sigicogo sigi Detailed in system settings -> notifications
Dynamic Notification dɔrɔn de jira k’a sɔrɔ i ma kunnafoni pop up fɔlɔ jira.
Kana a jira k’a sɔrɔ ekran bɛ landscape kɔnɔ
A jira ka ɲɛsin ringer mode Changement ma
Display brief animated icon bɛ ringer mode kura jira
Display Dynamic Notification ni i ye kunnafoniw (ko kɛlenw) sɔrɔ ani screen is
U fila bɛɛ bɛ on & off
- walasa ka baara kɛ k’a sɔrɔ ekran fagalen don, Device ka kan ka kɛ ni lock fɛɛrɛ ye, a dɔgɔyalenba (swipe to unlock) walima Always On Display Enabled
- ni kunnafoni dɔ sɔrɔla ka sɔrɔ ekran tun bɛ kɛnɛ kan, ni appli y’a jira, a tɛna o jira tugun ni ekran fagara bawo i b’a dɔn kaban ko a bɛ i bolo.

Ladɔnniyali bɛna taamasiyɛn kɛ i n’a fɔ a bɛ ye cogo min na dɔrɔn n’i y’a bonya i bolo fɛ, n’i y’a dɔgɔya walima k’a sɔgɔsɔgɔ kunnafoni bonyalen na, n’i ye kunnafoni dɔgɔyalen sɔgɔ walima n’i ye kunnafoni yɛrɛ bila.
Ni %1$s Always On Display tun bɛ On, aw bɛ Notification dynamic jira a kɔnɔ
O ni kamera dingɛ bonya ye kelen ye
O cogo kelen na ni statusbar ye.
Style kura bɛna fara a kan regular kan

I ka abonné bɛna kura ye i yɛrɛ la ani wari hakɛ min fɔra sanfɛ san o kalo walima kalo o kalo (i ye min sugandi) o bɛna sara i la fo n’i y’i ka abonnément tiɲɛ sani abonné waati min tun bɛ o waati la, o ka ban. i bɛ se ka abonnés (abonnenw) ɲɛnabɔ ani ka auto renewal (auto renewal) dabila ka bɔ Google Play jatebɔsɛbɛnw labɛncogo la. ani ka bɔ nin appli in ɲɛ fɔlɔ la -> ( Manage Subscription ) butɔni
Ni i ye i bolo digi kinin fɛ walima kinin fɛ, o bɛna kunnafoni jiracogo fɔlɔ bɔ yen, i tɛ kunnafoni yɛrɛyɛrɛ bɔ yen. ani ni kunnafoni wɛrɛw bɛ yen, o kɔfɛta bɛna jira
Aw bɛ nin sugandi in kɛ miniti 5 kɔnɔ fu
Fɔlɔ ka sigicogo ban, ani ka a lajɛ ni yamaruya wajibiyalenw bɛ baara la, o kɔfɛ, i ka test digi walasa ka miniti 5 sɛgɛsɛgɛli waati daminɛ.
A daminɛ na, aw bɛ sɛgɛsɛgɛli kɛ Auto detect
Aw bɛ se ka premium style kɔrɔbɔ sani aw ka sanni kɛ. baara kɛ ni butɔni ye min bɛ ɲɛfɔli kɛ fɔlɔ (ɲɛ taamasiyɛn) .
Aw k’a mara fo kunnafoni kalanni walima a ka ban
Ni i magara siɲɛ kelen na, o bɛ se ka kɛ sababu ye ka magali kɛ bala la!
Walima aw bɛ taa a fɛ ni a bɔcogo danma ye

"- baarakɛminɛn kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnen dɔ ye kamera dingɛ min bɛ ɲɔgɔn sɔrɔ. - fɛn caman ɲɛfɔlenw. - se ka baarakɛcogo danfaralenw sigi sen kan magali kelen na, digi fila, maga jan, sɔgɔli ka taa kinin fɛ ani ka wuli ka taa numan fɛ. - bɛ da yamaruya kelen dɔrɔn de kan."
Pocket Mode, Ignorer touches ka a sɔrɔ i bɛ lock screen kan

Mun na premium? o y’an ta baara gɛlɛnba dɔ la min bɛ kɛ i n’a fɔ ka sistɛmu kunnafoniw cili pop up ani ka kunnafonidi fangama janya kɛ i n’a fɔ kamera dingɛ janya ye nin appli in dɔrɔn de ye appli si tɛ play store kan min tɛ se k’o kɛ o la apps ɲɔgɔnnaw sen bɛ o la a kana fɔ styling ni coloring
A bɛ sara san o san
